-- | This package provides conduit <tt>Sources</tt> for pcap data (
--   captured by wireshark, tcpdump, etc.) You can enumerate pcap files and
--   live interfaces.
--   
--   Based on <tt>pcap-enumerator</tt>.
module Network.Pcap.Conduit

-- | Convenient alias.
type Packet = (PktHdr, ByteString)

-- | Create a conduit <a>Source</a> from a pcap data file.
sourceOffline :: MonadIO m => FilePath -> Source m Packet

-- | Create a conduit <a>Source</a> from a live interface.
sourceLive :: MonadIO m => String -> Int -> Bool -> Int64 -> Source m Packet
